text: Yakhana tadera kache kona ayata paumche, takhana bale, amara kakhana'i manaba na ye, paryanta na amara'o ta pradatta ha'i, ya allahara rasulagana pradatta hayechena. Allaha e bisaye suparijnata ye, kothaya sbiya payagama prerana karate habe. Yara aparadha karache, tara atisatbara allahara kache pauche lanchana o kathora sasti pabe, tadera cakrantera karane.
